column5: I just got a photobucket account and uploaded pics on there. How do I get them here?  Thanks, Curt.
They have a a link with the image tags under the picture

under your pictures (in photobucket) there will be a line of code that says "Direct Link".  then when you are ready to post, use the "insert image" button (it has a picture of some hills and the sun, and it is directly below the font dropdown box). Copy the the "direct link" from your photo and paste it in the "insert image" box that appears.  and voila! you have posted your picture.
you log in to your account go to my album  browse to find picture on your hard drive upload to photobucket click on img code and it will copy link info then paste in your post
yup use the image code, copy and paste it into your thread.... piece of cake.  G
